description.zh-cn: 香港传媒人、电影监制和主持人。她于70年代先后在多家电视台任职，80年代在新艺城影业公司工作，对香港电影的黄金时代有重要贡献。其前夫为导演徐克。
description.en: A Hong Kong media personality, film producer, and host. She worked at several television stations in the 1970s and at Cinema City Film Productions in the 1980s, making significant contributions to the golden age of Hong Kong cinema. Her ex-husband is director Tsui Hark.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演，施南生的前夫。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director and the ex-husband of Nansun Shi.

description.zh-cn: 香港一家电视台，施南生曾在此担任制作及行政职位。
description.en: A television station in Hong Kong where Nansun Shi held production and administrative positions.

description.zh-cn: 香港的公共广播机构，施南生曾在此担任制作及行政职位。
description.en: The public broadcasting service in Hong Kong where Nansun Shi held production and administrative positions.

description.zh-cn: 香港一家已停播的电视台，施南生曾在此担任制作及行政职位。
description.en: A defunct television station in Hong Kong where Nansun Shi held production and administrative positions.

description.zh-cn: 香港一家电视台，施南生曾在此担任制作及行政职位。
description.en: A television station in Hong Kong where Nansun Shi held production and administrative positions.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影公司，施南生在80年代在此工作，并创造了港产片的黄金时代。
description.en: A Hong Kong film company where Nansun Shi worked in the 1980s, contributing to the golden age of Hong Kong cinema.

description.zh-cn: 香港一家收费电视台，施南生曾协助其开创。
description.en: A pay television station in Hong Kong which Nansun Shi helped to establish.

description.zh-cn: 一家收费电视公司，施南生曾协助其开创业务。
description.en: A pay television company whose business Nansun Shi helped to establish.

description.zh-cn: 香港一家通讯公司，施南生曾协助其开创收费电视业务。
description.en: A Hong Kong telecommunications company whose pay television services Nansun Shi helped to establish.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的学校，施南生的小学及中学母校。
description.en: A school in Hong Kong, which is the primary and secondary school alma mater of Nansun Shi.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一所高等教育机构，施南生毕业于此。
description.en: A higher education institution in the United Kingdom from which Nansun Shi graduated.

description.zh-cn: 施南生的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Nansun Shi.

description.zh-cn: 在该届颁奖典礼上，施南生获颁终身成就奖。
description.en: At this awards ceremony, Nansun Shi was awarded the Lifetime Achievement Award.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影女演员，为施南生颁发第43届香港电影金像奖终身成就奖。
description.en: A Taiwanese actress who presented the Lifetime Achievement Award to Nansun Shi at the 43rd Hong Kong Film Awards.

description.zh-cn: 在该届影展上，施南生获得金摄影奖。
description.en: At this film festival, Nansun Shi received the Berlinale Camera award.

description.zh-cn: 凤凰卫视旗下的一个频道，施南生曾在此担任政论节目主持人。
description.en: A channel under Phoenix Television where Nansun Shi served as a host for a political talk show.

description.zh-cn: 施南生与徐克于1996年结婚，后于2014年离婚。
description.en: Nansun Shi and Tsui Hark married in 1996 and later divorced in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 施南生曾就读于玛利诺修院学校的小学部和中学部。
description.en: Nansun Shi attended the primary and secondary sections of Maryknoll Convent School.

description.zh-cn: 施南生毕业于北伦敦理工大学，获得数据和计算理学学位。
description.en: Nansun Shi graduated from the Polytechnic of North London with a degree in Data and Computing Science.

description.zh-cn: 施南生于70年代在无线电视担任制作及行政职位。
description.en: Nansun Shi worked in production and administration at TVB during the 1970s.

description.zh-cn: 施南生于70年代在香港电台担任制作及行政职位。
description.en: Nansun Shi worked in production and administration at RTHK during the 1970s.

description.zh-cn: 施南生于70年代在佳视担任制作及行政职位。
description.en: Nansun Shi worked in production and administration at Commercial Television during the 1970s.

description.zh-cn: 施南生于70年代在丽的（亚洲电视）担任制作及行政职位。
description.en: Nansun Shi worked in production and administration at Rediffusion Television (ATV) during the 1970s.

description.zh-cn: 施南生于80年代在新艺城工作，并为港产片开创了黄金时代。
description.en: Nansun Shi worked at Cinema City during the 1980s, helping to create the golden age of Hong Kong cinema.

description.zh-cn: 施南生曾协助香港有线电视开创业务。
description.en: Nansun Shi assisted in the establishment of Hong Kong Cable Television.

description.zh-cn: 施南生曾协助传讯开创收费电视业务。
description.en: Nansun Shi assisted in the establishment of the pay television business for Chinese Television Network.

description.zh-cn: 施南生曾协助电讯盈科开创收费电视业务。
description.en: Nansun Shi assisted in the establishment of the pay television business for PCCW.

description.zh-cn: 施南生于1951年8月8日出生于英属香港。
description.en: Nansun Shi was born in British Hong Kong on August 8, 1951.

description.zh-cn: 在第43届香港电影金像奖上，施南生获颁终身成就奖，以表扬其对香港电影的重大贡献。
description.en: At the 43rd Hong Kong Film Awards, Nansun Shi was awarded the Lifetime Achievement Award in recognition of her significant contributions to Hong Kong cinema.

description.zh-cn: 林青霞在第43届香港电影金像奖上为施南生颁发终身成就奖。
description.en: Brigitte Lin presented the Lifetime Achievement Award to Nansun Shi at the 43rd Hong Kong Film Awards.

description.zh-cn: 在第67届柏林影展上，施南生获得金摄影奖（Berlinale Camera）。
description.en: At the 67th Berlin International Film Festival, Nansun Shi received the Berlinale Camera award.

description.zh-cn: 2012年，施南生加入凤凰卫视香港台担任政论节目主持人。
description.en: In 2012, Nansun Shi joined Phoenix Hong Kong Channel as a host for a political talk show.
